testsuite.name: ca.nrc.cadc.tap.parser.ValidateAdqlCoordSysTest
testsuite.system-out: SELECT spoly(spoint(radians(-0.5), radians(0.0)), spoint(radians(-0.5036628471217584), radians(4.0)), spoint(radians(2.5036628471217584), radians(4.0)), spoint(radians(2.5), radians(0.0))) FROM tap_schema.alldatatypes SELECT spoly(spoint(radians(1), radians(2)), spoint(radians(3), radians(4)), spoint(radians(5), radians(6))) FROM tap_schema.alldatatypes SELECT spoint(radians(3), radians(4)) FROM tap_schema.alldatatypes java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: 'GEOCENTER' is not a supported coordinate system. SELECT BOX('GEOCENTER', 1, 2, 3, 4) FROM tap_schema.alldatatypes SELECT spoly(spoint(radians(1), radians(2)), spoint(radians(3), radians(4)), spoint(radians(5), radians(6))) FROM tap_schema.alldatatypes SELECT spoly(spoint(radians(1), radians(2)), spoint(radians(3), radians(4)), spoint(radians(5), radians(6))) FROM tap_schema.alldatatypes java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: 'GEOCENTER' is not a supported coordinate system. SELECT CIRCLE('GEOCENTER', 1, 2, 3) FROM tap_schema.alldatatypes SELECT scircle(spoint(radians(1), radians(2)), radians(3)) FROM tap_schema.alldatatypes java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: 'TOPO' is not a supported coordinate system. SELECT POLYGON('TOPO', 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6) FROM tap_schema.alldatatypes java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: 'V2' is not a supported coordinate system. SELECT POINT('V2', 3, 4) FROM tap_schema.alldatatypes
